pkgmetadata.longdescription: Goodness of Fit Tests for High-Dimensional Linear Regression Models // Performs goodness of fits tests for both high and low-dimensional linear models. It can test for a variety of model misspecifications including nonlinearity and heteroscedasticity. In addition one can test the significance of potentially large groups of variables, and also produce p-values for the significance of individual variables in high- dimensional linear regression.
